title: Total player salaries in the sports industry by league 2018/19
yAxis: Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Sports League in the x axis and Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Sports League NFL has the highest Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars and CFL has the lowest Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars.
The minimum Sports League CFL has got 123.5 times less Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars than the maximum Sports League NFL.
min_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars in each Sports League on the y axis.
The maximum Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars 4.94 is found at Sports League NFL and the minimum is found at CFL where Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars is 0.04.
